text: Nemanja Dimitrijević (), (born February 7, 1992 in Belgrad) is a Paralympian athlete from Serbia. He competes in Javelin Throw in the F13, T13 classification. At the 2016 Summer Paralympics held in Rio, he won a bronze medal in athletics. ==References== Category:Paralympic athletes of Serbia Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Serbia Category:Living people Category:1992 births Category:Sportspeople from Belgrade Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Disabled track and field athletes Category:Serbian people with disabilities Category:Sportsmen with disabilities Category:Club throwers Category:Serbian male athletes Category:Paralympic medalists in athletics (track and field)
title: Nemanja Dimitrijević
